ರಾಬರ್ಟ್ ಕ್ಲೈವನ ‘ದ್ವಿ ಸರ್ಕಾರ’ವನ್ನು ರದ್ದು ಪಡಿಸಿದ ಶಾಸನ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:3974"},{"text":"

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:3985"},{"text":"

ಇಂಡಿಯನ್ ಕೌನ್ಸಲ್ ಶಾಸನ
